website_summaries.verdict: Beautiful Versace sunglasses that are significantly less pricey than many others by the brand.
pros: A pair of Versace's more affordable sunglasses that has a lot to offer for the value – feminine design, comfortable wear, and reasonably sturdy build
cons: They are made of plastic, but the material has a durable feel
A bit basic, but for the price you may not mind

customer_reviews.title: Product arrived 2 days late but I was happy when I opened up the the box to find ...
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived 2 days late but I was happy when I opened up the the box to find the Versace box containing the Versace Sunglass Case (shown in the picture), the warranty and proof of authenticity with instructions on how to check for authenticity, and of course, the sunglasses. They weren't made of cheap, light plastic or anything. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: It is a tad loose and may not be a comfortable fit for an exceptionally small head
customer_reviews.text: Product is as shown in photo. It is a tad loose and may not be a comfortable fit for an exceptionally small head.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Versace Ve4251 Sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Pretty and very stylist Versace Sunglasses with darkened lenses that shade the eyes from the glare of the sun. Durable and affordable price for high quality sunglasses. I highly recommended good buy and reliable free delivery on time.
customer_reviews.author: Tato

customer_reviews.title: wrong item sent
customer_reviews.text: I fell in love with these glasses in store, saw them on amazon for less than half the retail price and ordered immediately. First off, they were delivered 3 days after the delivery estimate and when I opened the package, the frames were not the same. The bag that the sunglass case came in had the correct serial number but the number on the case was totally different. I am very disappointed especially since this is VERSACE. I am returning the item and will not be purchasing these frames through amazon again since there is NO GUARANTEE you will be getting the frames you were expecting when you make the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Justine

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for narrow faces
customer_reviews.text: I got a great deal on this, as I know how much it retails for at Sunglass Hut and other stores. I absolutely love the product. It's the perfect size for my narrow face. The frame is big enough to cover my face/eyes well, but is not comically large on the sides.
customer_reviews.author: nariyal

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: good seller, I am satisfied with my purchase, I highly recommend them
customer_reviews.author: paula ozuna
